availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Indiana native. Married to Mary Margaret Prunty Burchfield. Father of Bertha T. Burchfield, Henry Burchfield, James Burchfield, Emma Burchfield, and Margery Burchfield. Shoemaker in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Shoemaker in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 168A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 798.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #23544.
"James Burchfield (1827-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial #61446150, accessed October 13, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/61446150.
